name: Betari Lintang Asmoro Tangi
greetingText: I really really like your name btw!
wishText: May your birthday bring you as much happiness as you bring me. Many happy returns of the day.
textInChatBox: how long will i love you? as long as stars are above you, and longer if i can. Happy birthday Lintangku❤️; may god always bless your plan in the future and always be happy! because seeing your smile is the most beautiful view that i see in this world.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Hadiahnya nanti nyusul ya sayangkuuu, kalo aku udah di jakarta. Happy Birthday Sayangnya Aku :*
replayText: click here, if you want to watch it again.
